Saepe cadendo

by brunosan

  • Archive
  • About
  • Twitter
  • C.V.

Anonymous

Sunday morning was again below freezing, and yet he was sleeping on the street...

…no lifeguard for you.

…it is not a matter of blindness, he can see you, too. Everyone´s got stuff to do. Nothing new under the Sun.

Then, without planning, someone left a hot chocolate and muffins. You didn´t ask for it. Probably was the smell that woke you up a couple of minutes after anonymous left it. Nobody around to ... "thank"? (For what?)

It must have felt good. A hot breakfast to relieve a bit of hunger and cold.

...and yet you decided to share some of your muffin with the birds and the squirrels...

Thanks for the lesson.

13 January 2011 • Send edit request What is this?
